metaDescription.content: With Ecommerce Keyword Analytics you could get the list of most promising keywords or find all the metrics for any query!

Key Features

  • üî¶

    Pinpoint high impact keywords for retail

    The app provides in-depth analysis for search keywords across major online retailers in 16 countries and reveal any ecommerce keyword‚Äôs most important stats.
  • üõçÔ∏è

    Understand shoppers' demand patterns

    Analyze keywords by domain, country, or month to pinpoint demand trends: seasonality, locales that have the highest interest in that keyword, and competitors.
  • üìà

    Assess ecommerce keywords‚Äô conversion potential

    Discover new opportunities with unique ecommerce keyword data‚Äînumber of product page visits, number of "Add to basket events", and conversions.

Pricing

Free trial
Free trial
$19.99/mo

Free 7-day trial, then $19.99/mo

Unsubscribe anytime

  • Analyze data across 130+ different online retailers
  • Check trends for retailers from 16 countries
  • Get insights about top keywords
  • Get all historical data (starting from Sept, 2020)

Free 7-day trial, then $19.99/mo

Unsubscribe anytime

Improve Conversions With Ecommerce Keyword Research

Ever wanted to take a sneak peek at the biggest ecommerce players‚Äô top-performing keywords to amplify your strategies? With the Ecommerce Keyword Analytics app, you can do this in no time.

Ecommerce Keyword Analytics allows you to pinpoint which keywords bring the highest impact to major e-tailers and to understand shoppers' demand patterns‚Äîall to build smarter marketing campaigns across marketplaces.

Learn from the top retailers‚Äô keyword strategies

The app provides in-depth analysis for search keywords across major online retailers in 16 countries. Amazon, Walmart, eBay, Best Buy, Etsy, ASOS, MediaMarkt, Zalando, and many others‚Äîyou‚Äôll get to analyze them all.

Evaluate any keyword‚Äôs performance

Reveal any ecommerce keyword‚Äôs most important stats‚Äîsearch volume, clicks, and orders‚Äîto prioritize your own optimization efforts.

Assess ecommerce keywords‚Äô conversion potential

Discover new opportunities with unique ecommerce keyword data‚Äînumber of product page visits, number of "Add to basket events," and conversions.

Explore ecommerce demand trends

You can also analyze any keyword by domain, country, or month to pinpoint demand trends: seasonality, locales that have the highest interest in that keyword, and competitors who target them.

Use keyword intel to level up your product strategy

Pinpoint which products relate to the best ecommerce keywords to: a) unwrap similar keywords (aka products) to tackle the most efficient search terms; b) reveal consumer interest trends that can impact your demand.

Show more
